award_title: CAREER: Realizing ultrahigh mobility semiconductors through light-matter interactions
subject: Making computational work actually reusable
body:
Hi Milan,

NSF's getting serious about public access, but it's tough to show that anyone's actually using what you shareâ€”especially computational stuff that isn't just a zip file somewhere.

I work with Ouro. We help researchers package and share code and data in a way that's genuinely usable and trackable. Makes it easier to demonstrate real-world reuse when that matters.

Figured it might be relevant for your imaging analysis or modeling work, or folks you collaborate with.

Happy to chat briefly if useful. Hope you have a good holiday season.

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
